description:
High-altitude adventures require high-performance gear. The Summit Series Pumori Down Parka uses a Cloud Down construction to help increase overall warmth and packability. The 800-fill ProDown™ is designed to stay toasty-warm even in wet conditions, so nothing will slow down your push to the summit.

  • Ultralight 10-denier shell is highly packable and has a PFC-free DWR finish to shed moisture
  • 800 fill-power hydrophobic ProDown™ absorbs less water, dries faster, and retains loft better than conventional down
  • Cloud Down construction helps reduce cold spots and increase packability
  • Women-specific shaped lining for a better fit and warmth retention
  • Helmet-compatible hood with a pre-tensioned opening and rear adjustment
  • Raglan sleeves for comfort with a pack
  • Concealed, zippered hand pockets keep essentials secure
  • Handwarmer pockets and two internal mesh drop pockets
  • Helmet-compatible hood with a pre-tensioned opening and cinch-cord adjustment
  • Internal hem cinch-cord with a riveted cord lock for adjustability
  • Elastic-bound cuffs seal out drafts
  • Relaxed fit leaves room for layering
  • Lightweight stuff sack included
name: The North Face Summit Pumori Down Parka - Men's
